com.zensols.log

Class LogUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zensols.log.LogUtil

  • public final class LogUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Changing the log level only seems to work from Java (as apposed via Clojure's interop system).

        Override the logging level of a given logger.

      • setAllLevel

        Reset the level for all loggers, including the root logger.

        Configure the system with the XML contents from the input stream.
        Parameters:
